data.name: 0000 (004.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: So I offered them some tea.

data.name: 0001 (004.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Everyone in the Computer Society was really pleased…

data.name: 0002 (004.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Mikuru!

data.name: 0003 (004.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Y-yes?

data.name: 0004 (004.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Great job!

data.name: 0005 (004.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Huh…?

data.name: 0006 (004.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: First, you use that tender smile of yours to get in close and lower their defenses…

data.name: 0007 (004.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: And then, that lets you creep in and gradually destroy them from the inside…

data.name: 0008 (004.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: With those methods, you can get away without having to needlessly fight on the frontlines.

data.name: 0009 (004.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: "As long as l can be friends with Mikuru…" I'm sure that satisfies them, right, Mikuru?

data.name: 0010 (004.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: H-huhhh?!

data.name: 0011 (004.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: It's a strategy that makes the very best use…

data.name: 0012 (004.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: …of our ultimate moe character, Mikuru!!

data.name: 0013 (004.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I wasn't really trying to d—

data.name: 0014 (004.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That's a pretty high-level strategy for someone like you.

data.name: 0015 (004.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I'm glad to see that my training has paid off!

data.name: 0016 (004.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: S-Suzumiya, I was only trying to serve them tea…

data.name: 0017 (004.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: It's fine, you don't have to be so modest.

data.name: 0018 (004.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I always knew you had it in you, Mikuru. You have a natural talent for this stuff!

data.name: 0019 (004.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: T-talent?

data.name: 0020 (004.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: How should I put it…? You're basically like an enchantress!

data.name: 0021 (004.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: W-what do you mean by that?!

data.name: 0022 (004.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You're just so small and cute—it makes people want to protect you!

data.name: 0023 (004.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That's the vibe you give off, right?

data.name: 0024 (004.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That kind of thing basically lets you enchant men and control them.

data.name: 0025 (004.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: S-Suzumiya, just what kind of impression do you have of me?!

data.name: 0026 (004.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Please don't think of me like that!

data.name: 0027 (004.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What are you crying about? You should be honored.

data.name: 0028 (004.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: It would be more of a sin not to take advantage of your god-given charm.

data.name: 0029 (004.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Eeeek—

data.name: 0030 (004.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Well, anyways…

data.name: 0031 (004.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Apart from Mikuru using her charm on the Computer Society members…

data.name: 0032 (004.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Ehhhh?! Please don't change the story as you see fit!

data.name: 0033 (004.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That's right—maybe we can start bringing the other clubs under our control, as well?

data.name: 0034 (004.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What do you think, Mikuru?

data.name: 0035 (004.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I think we should start with the baseball club, right?

data.name: 0036 (004.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I'm telling you I can't do that!

data.name: 0037 (004.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I'm just kidding, Mikuru.
